thread.title: Derby Walmart groundbreaking planned for next week
thread.title_full: Derby Walmart groundbreaking planned for next week - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Derby Walmart groundbreaking planned for next week
text:
DERBY, Vt - More than a decade after first proposing a store in Derby, Walmart will begin construction next week.
The Supercenter is planned for a site off Route 5.
Supporters of the project began trying to get a Walmart built here soon after the old Ames store closed in 2002. The developer finally won an Act 250 permit earlier this year. A ceremonial groundbreaking will be held on the site next Tuesday.
Related Stories:
Derby Walmart project receives Act 250 approval
Developer files Walmart application in Derby
Plans for Derby Walmart move forward
Derby Walmart gets greenlight
